        <name>SOWNotifyChangeVisibilitySNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SOWNotifyChangeVisibilitySNC = Class.create();
SOWNotifyChangeVisibilitySNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    CHANGE_REQUEST_TABLE: "change_request",
    CHANGE_TASK_TABLE: "change_task",
    canShowCallsTab: function(recordSysId, table) {
        if (table === this.CHANGE_REQUEST_TABLE || table === this.CHANGE_TASK_TABLE) {
            var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
            if (gr.get(recordSysId) && gr.canWrite())
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    canShowSendSMS: function(recordSysId, table) {
        if (table === this.CHANGE_REQUEST_TABLE || table === this.CHANGE_TASK_TABLE) {
            var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
            if (gr.get(recordSysId) && gr.canWrite())
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    type: 'SOWNotifyChangeVisibilitySNC'
};]]></script>
